page.title: 17My Helpful Neighbour
page.content: Our neighbour{Mrs. Williams}gets up at 8am and has a cup of tea. She then has a bath and gets dressed. After this she has a breakfast of wholemeal toast and tea. Then she makes her bed and washes the dishes, and does the rest of her housework. At about 11am with a friend from the Salvation Army she starts her daily visits. These visits are to old people who are sick, lonely or disabled. Then on to the {hospital}for further visiting of the sick. She has a light lunch at 1pm. The afternoon consists a Salvation Army service followed by a visit to the {Cheshire Homes }at{Marazion.}Then sometimes she collects for charity if theres time, she returns home and has an evening meal at 6pm. she then enjoys listening to{Radio Cornwall } while knitting or sewing.
